name: dailiness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the ordinary quality of life every day: At times, the essential dullness and dailiness of marriage would overcome her. We don't find out much about the dailiness of the poet's life. I'm interested in food, but the dailyness of it can be boring.
More examplesFewer examplesHis new book is a portrait of life and its soothing dailiness.She has lived long enough to have learned that dailiness outlasts despair.You don't seem to have that dailyness about your relationship.
